title: Meditation: Awake & Open Awareness
itunes:title: Meditation: Awake & Open Awareness
description: Meditation: Awake & Open Awareness - This calming meditation practice helps settle the mind with the breath and then opens to the changing flow of experience, letting life be just as it is.
